All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.SwingConstants, javax.swing.table.TableCellRenderer
public class TableColorizingRenderer
extends javax.swing.table.DefaultTableCellRenderer

A specific TableCellRenderer that colourizes a particular cell based on some ColourFilters that have been stored according to the value for the row

Author:
Claude Duguay, Scott Deboy , Paul Smith
See Also:
Serialized Form
